channel.title: Making a weapon an "instant" kill weapon and making a scoreboard
channel.description:
I would like to make the cat toy, item # 6541 an instant killer weapon for admins only.
Second, I would like to make a scoreboard showing people online and their total levels in rank 1-X.
Thanks.
-won

item.title: Making a weapon an "instant" kill weapon and making a scoreboard
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Cozmo131:

I suggest NOT doing this but actually using a ring so it is less likely to fall into a noob’s hands

  1. he could make it so that admins cannot die so they cannot lose the ring or w\e hes making combat.

  2. dont give it to normal players?? stupid…

Read full topic

item.title: Making a weapon an "instant" kill weapon and making a scoreboard
item.dc:creator: @i_aint_yo_mama i aint yo mama
item.description:
@i_aint_yo_mama wrote:

to make the cat toy an instant kill wepion go to

item.cfg

search the id number

then change all the numbers beside it tp 99999999 that should work.

To make it admins only delet it to all shops and drops and only give it to admins.

Read full topic
